edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.actors

Class Actor

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.actors.Actor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, Player

    public abstract class Actor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the superclass for all game object types who act upon each other through the game's logic. Shared fields and methods for all actor subtypes are contained within this class, including the amount of health an actor has, the actor's current weapon and position, and whether or not the actor is alive.
